name: oXygen License Server - for trial licenses only
description: This app runs the oXygen License Server. If you use it with licenses other than trials, the license acivated with this server will loose its activation once the server is restarted and will become unusable.

ADMIN_PASSWORD.description: The password for the user "admin" - used to connect to the web administration interface.

USER_PASSWORD.description: The password for the user "user" - it should be configured in the oXygen applications.
